summary: REQ-27 and REQ-28 appear implemented via a new reusable MarketingBanner component and its insertion near the top of PublicOverviewPage. REQ-29 (adding the required static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated) is not evidenced in the provided diff summary. Additionally, non-requested changes include modifications to project metadata/summary files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required banner image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the banner component (no backend image serving).
missing_requirements.reason: The banner component references the expected public asset paths, but the diff summary does not show the image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained repository summary/metadata files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json), which were not requested as part of the UI banner work.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on adding a marketing banner component, integrating it into PublicOverviewPage, and adding image assets. No requirement mentions updating these project summary/state files.
